name: College Craze
description:
Welcome to Sugardale, a mid-sized college town and home of prestigious Sugardale University. You play as an incoming female freshman, ready to make your mark on the world.

Choose to study hard, work off-campus, or party every weekend. Manage your grades, followers, and bank account as you meet and interact with the 15 (and counting!) unique characters of Sugardale.

Create your own story and get into steamy situations, all while helping (or sabotaging) your friends, keeping secrets, and revealing mysteries about the town's shady happenings.






Ever want to see yourself in your games? Customize your character's skin tone, hair color, and hairstyle. See those changes appear in CGs throughout the game!






Characters around you don't forget about what you've done. So be careful about what you do, what you say, and who you interact with. Not all paths lead to victory.
